snippet.title: Shell Houston Open 2014: Bill Haas, Charley Hoffman lead, Phil Mickelson, Keegan Bradley in the mix
snippet.description:
Shell Houston Open 2014: Bill Haas, Charley Hoffman lead, Phil Mickelson, Keegan Bradley in the mix by Mark Sandritter on Apr 3 2014, 8:29p
It was a good day for some of the best in the world at the Golf Club of Houston on Thursday. Phil Mickelson got off to a solid start with a bogey free opening round.

snippet.title: The Pacers are falling apart
snippet.description:
The Pacers are falling apart by James Herbert on Apr 1 2014, 11:06a
Indiana has fallen into a funk down the season's stretch run.

snippet.title: Justin Verlander undergoes surgery, should be ready for spring training
snippet.description:
Justin Verlander undergoes surgery, should be ready for spring training by Neil Weinberg on Jan 9 2014, 5:14p
Tigers ace Justin Verlander underwent surgery Thursday morning to repair his core muscle, but he should be ready for spring training.

snippet.title: Time to delete Mickey Mantle from the Hall of Fame
snippet.description:
Time to delete Mickey Mantle from the Hall of Fame by Steven Goldman on Jan 7 2014, 12:10p
And a bunch of other guys can go with him if we take the PEDs scolds to their illogical extreme.

snippet.title: Emeka Okafor injury: Wizards' center out indefinitely with herniated disc in neck
snippet.description:
Emeka Okafor injury: Wizards' center out indefinitely with herniated disc in neck by Mike Prada on Sep 19 2013, 10:42a
Washington Wizards starting center Emeka Okafor will miss an extended amount of time after suffering a herniated C4 cervical disc in his neck.

snippet.title: Emeka Okafor injury puts pressure on Wizards' young bigs to improve
snippet.description:
Emeka Okafor injury puts pressure on Wizards' young bigs to improve by Satchel Price on Sep 19 2013, 10:26a
Emeka Okafor's injury opens a door for the Wizards' young big men -- Kevin Seraphin, Jan Vesely and Trevor Booker -- to step up. Can any of them do it?

snippet.title: NBA news roundup: Dwyane Wade resumes basketball activity after knee treatment, Blake Griffin ready to step up for Clippers
snippet.description:
NBA news roundup: Dwyane Wade resumes basketball activity after knee treatment, Blake Griffin ready to step up for Clippers by Drew Garrison on Aug 15 2013, 9:59p
A three-time NBA champion continues dealing with knee issues, Blake Griffin preps to expand his game and more from around the league Thursday.

snippet.title: Transition game: After decades of hiding painful childhood memories, former NBA All-Star Kenny Anderson is ready for a new phase in his life
snippet.description:
Transition game: After decades of hiding painful childhood memories, former NBA All-Star Kenny Anderson is ready for a new phase in his life by David Roth on Jul 25 2013, 12:20p
To watch Kenny Anderson play, when it was among the most important things in my life, meant parking at Giants Stadium, climbing a long flight of stairs along with a few thousand other fans --...

snippet.title: 'She is gone!': The search for the Gibson home run ball and for the answers to a family tragedy
snippet.description:
'She is gone!': The search for the Gibson home run ball and for the answers to a family tragedy by David Davis on Jun 20 2013, 10:48a
Kirk Gibson is sitting in the visitors' dugout two hours before game time. The Arizona Diamondbacks manager is watching his players stretch and take batting practice before they meet the Dodgers...

snippet.title: The Spurs are the NBA's dad team: A roster breakdown
snippet.description:
The Spurs are the NBA's dad team: A roster breakdown by Spencer Hall on Jun 19 2013, 12:42p
The Spurs may or may not win the NBA title this year, but they are all your dads, and that is forever.
